title: Soviet Cartoons of Red Square Parades MCQ 1

content.prompt: The depiction of the Soviet Union in the images is best explained as illustrating which of the following developments in late-twentieth-century communist states?

choices.label: Increasing instances of using force to quell political protests
Increasing political instability because of military coups

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
